Master Answer:
Antibiotics have no effect on response to inactivated vaccines or most live vaccines in Canada. Your baby being on amoxicillin is not a contraindication to receiving 6 month vaccines and you can still take him for his immunization appointment.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: My baby 6 months vaccine is due. He is on amoxicillin antibiotics for cough cold. Can I still give him vaccine
